About Me

BIO

I'm a developer here in Louisville, KY with emphasis on building full-stack websites and applications using JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and any new technologies I am learning at the time. I have a passion for web development and learning on a daily basis. When I am working on a project I like to ensure that it is clean and is responsive on any screen size.

I am currently a retail sales associate with AT&T here in Louisville and have been so for nearly two years. Before that I had spent over 4 years in the real estate industry, two as a sales agent and two creating websites for various real estate teams.

Feel free to reach out to me on Twitter or LinkedIn. I'd love to connect!
